item.title: CVE-2021-24982|2024-08-03T19:49:14.172Z -- unknown -- child%20theme%20generator
item.description: The Child Theme Generator WordPress plugin through 2.2.7 does not sanitise escape the parade parameter before outputting it back, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting in the admin dashboard
